Ik Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
August 9, i960
Dtr. Jfaurice P. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Iteurice:
Thanks very much for your August 8 letter. Since Harold Hill, our
fiscal officer, approved this before leaving, but is now away on
vacation, I hope and trust the certification now provided is satisfactory.
Wte are seeking to adhere carefully next year to the budget earlier
approved by you, which provides for $36,800.00 to come from the W. K.
Kellogg Foundation. A copy of this budget, now approved by the Board,
is attached.
The program report is not yet fully on stencil. I am trying to expedite
this, and hope we can get you a copy of this, within two weeks, to complete
our report to you for the past year.
Once again, if there are other items you need, please let me knew.
Most sincerely.
Harry J. Skomia
President
